parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Object

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets orientation of 3D control model. It is similar to [[setVectorDirAndUp]] command for an object.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetModelDirAndUp''' [dir, up]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control : [[Control]] - 3D control
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [dir, up] : [[Array]] - format [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> dir : [[Array]] - [[vectorDir]]
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> up : [[Array]] - [[vectorUp]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl3D [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]] [[0,1,0],[0,0,1]]; //default orientation</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[vectorDir]], [[vectorUp]], [[setVectorDirAndUp]]
</value></part></template></root>
